title: Moterys Meluoja Geriau
overview: Moterys Meluoja Geriau is a Lithuanian TV series produced by TV3. It is one of the most watched TV programs in Lithuania. It is based on a novel by Daiva Vaitkevičiūtė. In the beginning, the series follows four young women and their love interests. In later seasons the series don't concentrate on them as much.
